column4: I wish Ubuntu wasn't so slow on my pc.. ubuntu is ideal, but on this PC, it is really slow.
The liveCD and all stuff like that, and even when it is installed, still are slow.
I'm in Gentoo now for it's speed. @earth|afk: Processor - AMD Athlon XP 2600+; Video card: ATI Radeon 9600 XT; Jamminpotato: I'm on gentoo right now. Openbox. ladydoor: No, but it seems nice.
I don't use XUbuntu, but my best friend does, and he swears by it
